title: Getting queue dodge timers as i cannot even select anything in champ select
body: Title. Basically, I keep getting queue dodge timers for the past couple of games because when I load into champ select, the icons don't appear and i cannot even seem to select any champ, leading to a dodge. Not sure why, if this happens again my dodge timer will go all the way to 20 minutes.

replies.body:
It sounds a lot like your connection to our matchmaking servers is poor or unstable. This usually happens if your local network settings are not compatible with League or if there are issues in your network routing. Let's take a closer look into the former by having you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are set properly for Leauge.

Let me know if this caused any changes.
